Welcome!

My name is Trey Brosnan, and I'm a Computer Science student at Carnegie Mellon (expected May 2026).

I build interactive XR experiences, AI tooling, and real-time 3D graphics for the web. Previously built AI coding tools used by 100k+ creators and shipped production backends with robust validation systems.

I work across Python, TypeScript, Go, and C/C#, focusing on performance-minded engineering and systems that actually ship.

Controls

W A S D
Move around
MOUSE Look around (pointer lock)
CLICK Grab or release objects
ESC Open pause menu
LEFT STICK Move around
RIGHT SIDE Look around
TAP Interact with objects
MENU Open pause menu

Hand tracking is optional. Enable it from the onboarding screen.
